name: C++ Development with CMake and Qt
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y qt6-base-dev qt6-tools-dev-tools && curl -sSL https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | gpg --dearmor > microsoft.gpg && sudo mv microsoft.gpg /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/microsoft.gpg && sudo sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/$(lsb_release -rs)/prod $(lsb_release -cs) main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/microsoft.list' && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y powershell
